Description:
Classic Californian Bungalow – Close to CBD!
Oozing all the classic features such as decorative timber fretwork, plate racks/rails, patterned ceilings and cornices, and a stately front verandah; this home offers a perfect opportunity to renovate and reap the rewards. Includes 3 good size bedrooms, formal lounge, (gas heating), formal dining and separate kitchen. Outside includes an established garden with single garage and shed. Situated only a short walk to the CBD, Latrobe University, schools shopping and eateries, the position offers real convenience. A classic period home with huge potential and all the convenience of location. Don't delay, will not last!
Insights: 113 Sternberg Street, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 74 other 3 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Spectacular Dream Home in Perfect Location
Complete privacy, stunning views, light filled spaces position this multi-level home to become your own personal paradise. Set on 987sq.m of prime real estate and showcasing high quality finishes, the home provides an atmosphere that is both luxurious and tranquil. Designed to accommodate for any occasion, the elegant Jarah timber kitchen with granite benches and Miele stainless steel appliances plus butlers pantry will impress the resident chef whilst the living options are perfect for executive entertaining or relaxation. The master bedroom upstairs is huge with commodious walk-in-robe, ensuite with spa, Italian tiling, four other bedrooms are of great size with walk in & built-in robes and two luxurious bathrooms. Further offering flexibility for harmonious family living, the ground level level is ideal as a teenage retreat or as accommodation for relatives and guests. Capped off with a landscaped gardens including an in-ground heated swimming pool and spa with water features. This magnificent home ultimately promises a lifestyle of leisure. Nestled in an exclusive neighbourhood, complimented by equally prestigious properties, yet within an easy walk to the Kennington Reservoir, Shopping Centres, La Trobe University, and quality schools. Meticulously designed Masterfully built by Steve Bish. Your dream home is waiting for you.
Insights: 5 Lakewood Drive, KENNINGTON VIC 3550 was last sold in 2015 and 5 other 5 bedroom house in KENNINGTON have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern & Complete Renovation
The light and space is refreshing everywhere within this home, and it's ready for you to enjoy. Featuring a neutral colour palette throughout, sleek floating floors, quality tiles... A full and complete renovation, both inside and out, has taken place in this 5 bedroom (or 4 + study), 3 living area home.
The kitchen is the heart of the home and would be a pleasure for the cook of the house with a complete modern fit out, new quality appliances, dishwasher and all that you would expect in a home of this calibre. This flows to all the living areas and continues out to the main outdoor entertaining deck.
Year round comfort is assured with ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling and ceiling fans.
The large main bedroom has a sizeable new ensuite with double basins and walk-in robe, while the other 4 bedrooms have built-in robes, and the main bathroom has had a full update catering to everyone's needs.
There is the choice of a 2nd undercover entertaining area on the opposite side of the main pergola so you can entertain at any time of the day.
The garden is low maintenance and has provision for side access for a trailer, small caravan or boat.
Situated in a quiet street, just minutes to the new Strathdale Safeway complex, Strath Village shopping precinct, schools and University. Inspection by appointment. The home is currently rented with wonderful tenants until late November 2015 at $430 per week.
Judy-Ann Cantwell : 0418 583 265

Description:
CITY FRINGE TOWNHOUSE
Conveniently located within walking distance to Bendigo's CBD is this solid two storey townhouse, offering a great opportunity for both investors and owner occupiers.
The residence offers a spacious open plan kitchen/meals and living space downstairs, with both bedrooms and bathroom on the second level.
Separate laundry facilities and a single carport for off-street undercover parking is also included.
This unit is set at the rear of this unit block, to help ensure a peaceful environment.
Also within close proximity is a supermarket, public transport, schools and recreational facilities.

Description:
ABSOLUTE QUALITY AND STYLE
Set in a highly sought-after area offering an abundance of style and street appeal, this home is sure to impress even the most astute buyer. Immaculately presented throughout, the house comprises 4 spacious bedrooms, the master with a luxurious ‘his and hers’ walk in robe and ensuite and built in robes to the remaining bedrooms, a beautifully appointed kitchen with quality appliances overlooking the open plan dining and living area, a separate formal lounge room plus a stunning, glassed atrium including a water feature and fernery as the centrepiece of the house. Offering attractive, and high quality fixtures and finishes, the house also includes a 3 piece family bathroom with a corner spa bath, ducted reverse cycle heating and cooling plus additional gas ducted heating ensuring year round comfort, the convenience of a security system and clever storage options throughout. The outside beckons with a spacious undercover entertaining area, beautifully landscaped gardens, a double garage under roofline plus a 6x10m workshop. All this and more set within minutes to schools, La Trobe Uni, shopping and the CBD, an inspection will impress!

Description:
Perfect position for convenience!
Premier location, walking distance to all Kennington facilities. A great family home or investment property it features 3 bedrooms, all with BIR's and 2 with split system cooling. A stylishly updated 3 piece bathroom & good size laundry. The lounge room has Gas heater plus Split System airconditioner. The updated kitchen and adjoining meals area is practical in design and features a new wall oven, ample cupboards, dishwasher and overlooks the backyard with access to the covered entertaining area. Sited on a 1000 m2 allotment with double carport and colorbond workshop.

Description:
The Perfect Package
Ever sought-after Kennington offers this immaculate renovated residence, situated in a well settled street with close proximity to all amenities.
A superb option for investors and home seekers alike, it possesses appeal in abundance.
The pristine interior embraces two spacious living areas, and recently updated, the kitchen has stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher.
A lengthy breakfast bar adds plenty of extra seating availability to the meals area too.
New shower screens, vanities and tiles have been installed to bathroom and ensuite.
Along with the ensuite, the main bedroom has walk-in robe and another two contain built-in robes.
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating.
Even the carpets are only four years old and four TV points throughout the house will please movie buffs.
Outdoors is equally attractive within the securely fenced yard where a massive Claret Ash takes centre stage and supplies exceptional shade for playtime. A verandah provides shade for barbeques, and there is a veggie patch to help fill your salad bowl.
Established landscaping, garden shed, double carport and rear access for a boat or caravan complete this excellent package.
Schools, university, buses, Kennington Reservoir, sporting and recreational facilities are all nearby.
A few doors along, a playground leads to Grassy Flat Creek trail. This is the scenic route to Kennington Village, a local shopping centre that incorporates a new Safeway that is a handy cycle or stroll away. Altogether, the perfect family home or rental property!
Paul Byrne : 0439 441 198

Description:
Low Maintenance - Just move in and enjoy!
Perfectly positioned in a very prolific location and within walking distance to all of the best facilities and amenities that border Kennington, Strathdale and Flora Hill, is this unique weatherboard home with all the upgrades and a “nothing to do but move in and enjoy” attitude from my Vendors.
Great for 1st home buyers, couples or retirees, the home offers a floor plan which consists of an open plan lounge/dining area with a brand new kitchen and appliances, 3 good sized bedrooms and a smaller 4th bedroom or study with its own ensuite.
The tiled main bathroom has been fully renovated, plus the home has been freshly painted inside and out, with a bonus of new carpets and window furnishings.
For personal comfort, ducted heating and reverse-cycle wall-mounted air-conditioning is available.
Front and rear verandahs and a low maintenance yard with side entertaining area and tandem parking.
The best buy in this quality location, at an entry level that is rarely seen.
Inspection is highly recommended.
Nekti Tzouroutis : 0412 242 321

Description:
Quality Kennington Home or Investment
This four bedroom, 2 bathroom, brick veneer property is potentially one of the most solid investments that Kennington has to offer. Just a short walk from LaTrobe University, a stone's throw from Strath Hill, Strath Village and Kennington Village, it's position is impeccable. Whether you're looking for a fantastic investment in the University precinct, or a quality family home, this is a must see!
The first of four bedrooms is just off the wide entrance. It has a built-in desk and shelving and a timber feature wall. Further in there's a lounge room split into two levels. The upper level opens to a dining area through sliding glass doors which in turn opens to a side undercover entertaining area one way and to a good-size kitchen the other, where there's an electric wall oven, a ceramic hotplate and plenty of storage.
The laundry is located behind the kitchen and has access to the backyard.
Three bedrooms including the main are on the east side of the home. All have built-in wardrobes and one has a built-in desk and shelving. There's an en suite in the main with a double shower, and a two-piece family bathroom central to the home.
Double gates on the driveway open to a single garage at the back of the property, with a double carport at the front also. A bus stops at the top of the street for a quick commute to the uni and CBD which further adds to the convenience.
Insights: 2 Hakea Street, KENNINGTON VIC 3550 was last sold in 2015 and 26 other 4 bedroom house in KENNINGTON have recently been sold.

Description:
Instant Appeal in the Heart of Kennington
This welcoming four-bedroom residence offers inherently liveable spaces and a family-friendly location within easy reach of both primary and secondary schools, La Trobe University, Kennington Reservoir, and Strathdale's local shopping. An elevated entrance open into an accommodating interior offset by freshly polished floorboards throughout, a spacious lounge room with fireplace progresses into a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances overseeing a casual meals space. Easy access to the outdoor domain incorporates an alfresco dining and reclining area, bordered by low-maintenance gardens. An above ground solar heated pool for the kids to enjoy. Back indoors, the privately zoned sleeping quarters (serviced by a modern bathroom with spa) consist of big bedrooms with built in robes, the separated master bedroom offers parents privacy, plus a small office, car accommodation, all situated in a quite street close to everything you will ever need.
Insights: 19 Kara Street, KENNINGTON VIC 3550 was last sold in 2015 and 26 other 4 bedroom house in KENNINGTON have recently been sold.

LET YOUR IMAGINATION RUN WILD!
ST AIDANS PARK is a gated estate which comprises of 30 apartments. The estate is secure with a private entrance, stunning landscaped gardens, swimming pool, lift access to all levels and secure undercover parking.
Apartment 10 is on the second level of the Maryfield Building plus attic space.
It is a two level apartment and large enough for three bedrooms and substantial living. There are two designated car spaces.
A rare opportunity to purchase a piece of Bendigo's history with arguably the best apartments in Bendigo. Designed your own plans, use your own builder - a fantastic lifestyle for all ages.

Description:
CHARACTER HOME + CATHEDRAL / CBD VIEWS
This is the home you've been waiting for, ideally positioned within walking distance to all you desire. Perfect for first home buyers, young families, ideal for downsizers or the perfect addition to add to your investment portfolio. The large Fourth bedroom enjoys elevated views over the CBD through the leadlight windows, also featuring a wide hallway, polished floorboards, high ceilings & ornate features. The home accommodates four bedrooms, three of which have built in robes. One bathroom services the home & the family kitchen is very well equipped and offers an open plan meals area. Set back from the road, perched high and positioned on an allotment of approx. 640 sq.m, with access from Steane Street, the rear of the property has a single car garage plus a second off street car park. Enjoy the lifestyle, walk to everything, supermarkets and public transport on your doorstep. This is living.

Description:
A LIFESTYLE OUT OF THIS WORLD
ST AIDANS PARK is a gated estate which comprises of 30 apartments. The estate is secure with a private entrance, stunning landscaped gardens, swimming pool,
lift access to all levels and secure undercover parking.
Apartment 21 is on the second level of the St Aidans Building with its own private balcony at the rear. It is accessible via the lift or take the stairs. This apartment shell is referred to as 'The Chapel' and still has remnants of the original leadlight. It is a single level apartment and large enough for three bedrooms and substantial living. There are two designated car spaces and a separate storage room.
A rare opportunity to purchase a piece of Bendigo's history with arguably the best views of Bendigo. Designed your own plans, use your own builder - let your imagine run wild.

Description:
INVEST IN LOCATION
When talking investment and location it does not come much better than this. Fully renovated throughout with a brand new kitchen, this 2 bedroom detached unit presents as an opportunity not to be missed. Set away at the rear of the units with its own single carport and ample parking for a second vehicle, large private courtyard with garden shed. Air-conditioning and heating are just a few features of this property. Walking distance to the CBD and getting a very healthy rental return make the property very attractive to the investor or simply someone looking to down size and enjoy a lifestyle. Move quickly.

Offering four bedrooms, two bathrooms and multiple living areas this well designed and functional home will suit a multitude of buyers. With cathedral ceilings and split level design, this one of a kind home features a north facing outdoor area overlooking the spacious rear yard with vehicle access and oversized double garage. Close to Kennington Village, Strath Village, Bendigo South East Secondary College and Kennington Reservoir.

Description:
MAKE YOUR MOVE WITH CONFIDENCE!
I'd act quickly. This is more than just a unit / townhouse. It is a home with room, and added features that will surprise you. In a prime location, nicely set back from the road it is quiet and private. With single garage & visitor parking, the home offers abundance of storage, and a light & bright atmosphere. With heating and cooling via reverse cycle, the kitchen is well appointed and overall presentation is neat as a pin. The two bedrooms are sizeable, master with plenty of built in robes and a second split system. With bathroom close by, and access through the laundry to the lovely entertaining zone for BBQ's & gatherings. Your land at the side of the property, adds an extra bonus to the property, with a grassed area & landscaped yard, it is again private & spacious, but not overly high maintenance.

Description:
Easy Living in Style
This quality home in a prestigious locale is a blueprint for the good life.
Close to brilliant shopping amenities, schools, the university and parks, the area is established and very leafy, with well-maintained streetscapes.
It's a busy part of Bendigo, very desirable, but because this is a u-shaped street, you won't get through traffic at all, so it's a quiet haven of domestic comfort.
The home is north-south oriented, and set on the high side of the street, so you have the open feeling of sky and trees to look out on.
Excellent renovation has turned the inside into a showpiece. The tiled entry opens into an open plan family entertainment area. Wide sliding doors lead on to the undercover outdoor dining patio which overlooks a fully landscaped yard and beyond to the in-ground pool.
There's a spacious dining area inside too, adjacent to the kitchen which is sparkling and beautifully designed. Gas bench-top cooker, breakfast bar with pendant lights, skylight, plenty of benchtop and, of course, room for all your appliances, you'd be hard-pressed to find a single improvement.
Four spacious bedrooms are sensibly designed, with the refurbished bathroom and separate toilet dividing the two kids' room from the parents' room and ensuite, which has the fourth bedroom adjacent.
The laundry leads to a superbly organized outdoor space, this one for practical purposes, with a small garden shed, and raised veggie beds.
The tour completes at the spacious carport and tandem lock up garage, with space behind for a workroom or storage shed.
Good fencing for maximum privacy and you're done: a home with absolutely nothing to do and everything to enjoy.

Description:
SPACIOUS MODERN UNIT WITH FANTASTIC COURTYARD
LOCATION, LOCATION...
Quietly situated in the heart of Kennington. Within excellent proximity to the CBD, Shops, Cafes & all services at your doorstep, this unit is a stand out. Comprising of two bedrooms, the layout features open plan lounge, with a private feel & natural light. With two bedrooms, the master is large & each contain built in robes. Comfort is assured with gas heating & reverse cycle cooling. The modern kitchen is well appointed & overlooks the fantastic rear courtyard which is paved & offers additional entertaining space. The two way bathroom is also modern and well appointed. The rear yard adds quality & space making this a very attractive opportunity for a rental investment, or an owner occupier. You will feel secluded whilst still being amongst the hustle and bustle which Kennington has to offer. Also features a single car garage with auto door. This unit will not last long in today's low interest rate market.
Bec Allen : 0438 528 091

Description:
LOCATION.... IDEAL INVESTMENT or 1ST HOME
One of 6 in a lovely quiet street in popular Kennington is a comfortable two bedroom unit. Suitable for investors, first home or retirees. Both bedrooms have BIR's. Kitchen with gas stove and pantry, a three piece bathroom and plenty of storage. Gas heating and reverse cycle cooling. Brand new carpet and vinyl throughout. Lovely private backyard. Ideal position close to Strath Village Shopping Precinct, schools, public transport.
